none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on August 01, 2013 Description from Terminal Escape:
This band was so far ahead of their time. It seems criminal to refer to this 1992 release as a demo, because the two-track recording masterfully harnesses all of their filth and the desperation that made MINDROT legends and would carry the guitarist on to DYSTOPIA shortly after. Guttural death metal with moments of somber doom, totally transcendent. LIVE IN THE STUDIO DEMO - FEBRUARY 1st 1992 And the seminal 1990 demo has been re-upped. You're welcome.
//4.bp.blogspot.com/-mVsD6LNIYVo/UfmZzLfI_7I/AAAAAAAAIT0/V1JQUzXASuM/s1600/mindrot+cover+copy.jpg //3.bp.blogspot.com/-GXqVr9wf6Hw/Ufmb7ZTxEgI/AAAAAAAAIUE/c3cUC-9P6zw/s1600/mindrot+copy.jpg http://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2010/08/mindrot.html

seo.title: Mindrot - "Live In The Studio" demo 1992 - Terminal Escape
